en: * airlines has a flight leaving at *.
cn: *航空公司有一架班机，在*起飞。

en: A cleaning fee will be charged if you smoke in this room.

cn: 如果可能的话来点鸡尾酒吧。

en: A cup of coffee for me.
A small cup of strong black coffee without milk or cream.
cn: 小杯浓的黑咖啡，不加牛奶和奶油。

en: A waiter will come to take your order.
cn: 服务员会过来为您点餐。

en: Advance Reservations. Can I help you?
cn: 这儿预订房间，需要效劳吗?

en: After landing on the airport, you can turn on you cell phone.
cn: 飞机降落在机场后，你就能打开手机了。

en: All bags-packages and persons are subject to search.
cn: 所有行李包裹以及个人一律接受安检。

en: All our rooms are full occupied.
cn: 我们所有的房间都满了。

en: All portable electronic devices, keys, coins and other metal objects should be placed on X-ray belt in separate container.
cn: 便携电器、钥匙、硬币、和其他金属物品置放单独盒内后，放X光安检传送带上。

en: All right. Will there be anything else?
All the connecting passengers are requested to proceed to Gate *
cn: 所有转机旅客请到*号登机门。

en: All the leaving passengers must go through this gate.
cn: 所有旅客都必须从这个检查口通过。
请给我一个靠走道的座位。

en: And now you want to change the booking, do you?
cn: 你想变更一下入住时间吗?

en: And would you mind opening your laptop?
cn: 您介意打开您的手提电脑吗?
请问你的电话号码是多少?
口袋里还有其它物品吗？

en: Are there any discount tickets for me?
Are there any restaurants still open near here?
cn: 这附近还有在营业的饭店吗?

en: Are you looking for something particular?
At gate * go through the security check and turn left, take the moving staircase at the end of the hall, then you will find it.
cn: *号登机口，在通过安检后左转，走到大厅的尽头乘电梯能到。

en: At what aisle is the frozen food?
Attention, please. Due to weather condition, all flights to * will be delayed.
cn: 各位旅客请注意，由于气候不佳，所有飞往*的班机都将延后起飞。

en: Be Careful When Using The Bath.

cn: 请出示登记证和身份证!

en: Can anyone tell me where I can buy the ingredients to make * food?
cn: 谁能告诉我哪里可以买到做*菜的原材料?

en: Can I change seats with you?
Can I get on the earlier flight instead?
cn: 我可以换成早一点的航班吗?

en: Can I have a one-way ticket to *, please?
cn: 请给我一张去*的单程票好吗?

en: Can I just pay a fine now?
ar: هل استطيع دفع غرامة أدفع غرامة الآن؟

en: Can I look at the menu, please?
Can I make a telephone call?
ar: هل يمكنني الحصول على مكالمة هاتفية؟

en: Can I make international calls here?
ar: هل استطيع القيام بمكالمة دولية من هنا؟

en: Can I move to an empty seat over there?
cn: 我可以移到那边的空座位吗?

en: Can I see your ticket, please?
Can I take one of those empty saets over there?
cn: 我可以坐在那边其中的一个空座吗?

en: Can I use your cell phone?
Can we have a quiet area?
cn: 我可以要一个安静的地方吗?

en: Can you change money for me?
Can you change the reservation, please?
cn: 我能更改一下订票的班机吗?

en: Can you come here when you have a second?
cn: 你有空时能到这里来一下吗?
你可以帮我找一位医生吗？

en: Can you give me your contact information?
cn: 你能给我你的联系方式吗?

en: Can you help me find my seat?
cn: 你能帮我找到我的座位吗?

en: Can you help me get my baggage? It's too heavy.
cn: 你能帮我拿行李吗? 实在太重了。

en: Can you show me on the map?
cn: 你可以在地图上指给我看?
ar: هل يمكنك أن تريني أين هو على الخريطة؟

en: Can you show me the way to my seat?

cn: 你有其他推荐的酒店吗？

en: Can you tell me how to fasten the seat belt?
cn: 您能告诉我怎么系安全带吗?

en: Can you tell me how to unfasten the seat belt?
cn: 您能告诉我安全带怎么解开吗?

en: Can you tell me where * is?
cn: 你可以告诉我*在那里吗？

en: Can you tell me where seat * is?
cn: 你能告诉我*座位在哪儿吗?

en: Can you tell me your flight number?
cn: 能告诉我你乘坐的航班号吗?

en: Can you write the name and address down?
cn: 你可以写下名字和地址吗？
ar: هل يمكنك أن تكتب لي الإسم و العنوان؟

en: Captain and all the members of his crew thank you for flying with us.
cn: 机长和所有组员感谢各位旅客搭乘本班机。
办理飞往世界各地登机手续。

en: Checking is done, thank you for your corporation.
Come to pay the fare and fetch your ticket * days before departure, please.
cn: 请于起飞前*天来付款取票。

en: Could I ask when you will arrive?
Could I talk to someone in charge?

cn: 你能描述一下你的行李吗?

en: Could you get a few small plates for us?
Could you get me on that flight, please?
cn: 能设法让我搭上那班飞机吗?

en: Could you give me a window seat?
cn: 可以给我靠窗的座位吗?

en: Could you give me more paper napkins?
cn: 你能多给一些餐巾纸吗?

en: Could you give me one more blanket?
Could you give me some airsickness medicine?
Could you hold the line, please? I'll check our room availability for that day.
cn: 请别挂断? 我要查一下那天的空房间。

en: Could you please help me put my baggage up there?
cn: 可以帮我把行李放上去吗?

en: Could you put your seat up, please?
Could you recommend some good restaurants around here?
cn: 你能推荐几家附近的好餐馆吗?

en: Could you repeat your order again?
Could you see if it's ready?
Could you tell me the current price?
cn: 你能告诉我现在房价是多少吗?

en: Could you tell me where to deal with the formalities?
cn: 您能告诉我去哪里办理手续吗?

en: Could you tell me your name, Sir?
cn: 能告诉我你的名字吗，先生?

en: Could you wait a little longer, please?
cn: 请您等稍长点时间可以吗?

en: Could you wait at the bar until I find an approprite table for you?
cn: 您能在吧台等一下，我为您找张合适的桌子?

en: Could you wait in line until a table is free, please?
cn: 请您排队等候空位好吗?

en: Depress Handle Until Bowl Is Empty.
cn: 压下把手直至便盆冲净为止。

en: Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us.
Do Not Smoke In The Bed.
Do you have a table for * please?
cn: 你能安排一张四人桌吗?

en: Do you have an English menu?
Do you have any bages to check?
cn: 你有什么行李要托运吗?

en: Do you have any direct flights coming back?
cn: 回程时你们有直飞的班机吗?

en: Do you have any empty seats together somewhere?
cn: 哪有在一起的空座位呢?

en: Do you have any lower fare?
Do you have any medicine for airsickness?
Do you have any other seats open where we can sit together?
cn: 还有没有其他连在一起的座位?

en: Do you have any particular restaurant in mind?
cn: 你想好有什么特别的餐馆吗?

en: Do you have any rooms available?

cn: 有没有小吃？有没有点心？

en: Do you have any sugar substitute?
Do you have any tickets available for that date?
Do you have anything for airsickness?
Do you have it in another color?
cn: 你们有没有另外的颜色?

en: Do you have more of this item in stock?
Do you have one to recommend?
Do you have the boarding pass for the next flight?
cn: 您有下一趟航班的登机牌吗?

en: Do you have this in my size?
Do you have this in stock?
Do you have time for coffee?
Do you know how long it will be?
Do you live with your parents?
Do you mind changing seats with me?
cn: 你介意跟我换下座位吗?

en: Do you prefer a smoking or non-smoking area?
cn: 您喜欢吸烟区还是非吸烟区?

en: Do you remember which aisle this was at?
cn: 你记得这货物在哪条货道里吗?

en: Do you sell organic vegetables here?

cn: 你们销售酒精类饮品吗？

en: Do you serve anything else besides drinks?
cn: 除了喝的你们这还有什么别的吗?

en: Do you think you could tell the kitchen to speed it up a little bit?
cn: 你能告诉厨房速度快一点吗?

en: Do you want to fly first or economy class?
cn: 您要头等舱还是经济舱?

en: Do you want to try it?
Does it need to take so long?
Does that really work? I'll give it a try.
cn: 真的有用吗? 我来试试。
请保管好随身携带的贵重物品。

en: Don't worry. It's just due to the lower pressure.
cn: 不用担心。只是由于低气压的缘故。

en: Double Lock Door. Use Safety Latch.
cn: 双保险门闩，请使用安全碰锁。

en: Early Book For Lunch Or Dinner.
Easy to use and great value too.
Employees Must Wash Hands Before Returning To Work.
cn: 员工便后必须洗手方可回到工作岗位。

en: Excuse me, but is the reservation for you?
Excuse me, this is my bag.
cn: 借过一下，这是我的行李。

en: Excuse me. What would you like to eat?
cn: 打扰一下，请问您要吃什么?

en: Excuse me. You have my seat.
cn: 不好意思，你坐到我的位子了。

en: First class fare of a one-way ticket from * to is *.
cn: 至*的单程机票，头等舱是*。

en: Flammable items cannot be taken with you into the aircraft.
cn: 易燃品不能随身带上飞机。
飞往*的*班，已经开始登机。
坐着的时候放脚的支撑物

en: For More On High Speed Internet Access, Including Trouble Shooting Information, Please Refer To The Guest Service Directory.
cn: 请查阅旅客服务指南获取更多的有关高速上网以及如何排除故障的信息。

en: for use only in case of fire
For Your Convenience, Cigarettes Are Available At The Front Desk.
cn: 为了您的方便，前台有香烟出售。

en: For your own safety, please go back to your seat and fasten the seat belts. Thank you.
cn: 请您回到您的座位，并系好安全带，以求安全。谢谢您的合作。

en: Full Central Heating With House Provided Hot Water * Hours.
cn: 中央暖气系统，房间*小时提供热水。

en: Give me a cup of coffee.

cn: 给我一杯没有咖啡因的咖啡。

en: Give me a one-way ticket to *
Give me a pound of tomatoes and a pound of eggplants.
cn: 给我一磅番茄和一磅茄子。

en: Go all the way to the back and turn right.
Go straight following the sign ang you will see the gate.
cn: 跟着指示走，你将看到登机口。

en: Goods Prohibited To Exit The Country.
Guest Rooms In This Hotel Are Not Equipped With Wireless(Wifi) High Speed Internet Access.
cn: 本酒店旅客房间内没有无线上网设施。

en: Have your ticket and passport ready for the check-in agent.
cn: 请将机票和护照准备好办理登机手续。

en: Here are my passport and ticket.
Here, take one of these trolleys.
Here's your ticket, boarding pass, passport and baggage claim tag.
cn: 这是您的机票，登机证，护照和行李提领证。

en: Here's your ticket, your boarding pass and the tag of your baggage.
cn: 这是您的机票、登机牌和行李签。

en: How can I get to the baggage claim area?
cn: 去行李领取处怎么走呢?

en: How do I deal with my luggage?
How do I recline my seat?
cn: 我怎么让我的椅子躺下?

en: How do I turn on the light?
How do you spell it, please?
How do you spell that, please?
cn: 请讲一下是怎么拼写的?

en: How long do you plan to stay?
How long will you be staying?
How many bags do you want to check in?
How many people are in your family?
How many pieces of luggage do you have?
How much does it cost to get to *?
How much dose this meat weight?
How much is a room for one person per night?
How much is a room for two people per night?
How much is a ticket to *?
How much is it per hour?
How much is it to call to *?
How much is it to get in?
How much is the round trip?
How much longer are we going to have to wait for our dinner?
cn: 我们还要等多久才能吃上饭呢?

en: How would you like to pay for it?
How would you like your coffee?
I am afraid that all the room with a view to the sea have been booked.
cn: 恐怕所有看得到海的房间都已经被预订了。

en: I am getting my car at the parking lot.
I am going to transfer in *.
I booked a single room in your hotel for *.
cn: 我在你们宾馆预定了这周五的单人房间。

en: I can't find the pet food.
I can't get my bag to fit into the overhead compartment.
cn: 我的包放不进上面的行李箱了。

en: I can't understand why this restaurant always serves so slowly.
cn: 我不明白这个饭店为什么总是上菜这么慢。

en: I don't think I ordered this dish.
I don't think this fish is proberly cooked.
cn: 我觉得这鱼好像没做熟。

en: I don't want the yolk to be too well-done.
I don't want to eat there.
I don't want to intake any sugar.
I feel a little bit cold.
I feel dizzy and weak. And I'm having this pain in my ear.
cn: 我感觉头晕、虚弱，耳朵也有点疼。

en: I feel very tired, because it's a very long flight.
cn: 我感觉很累，因为飞行时间很长。
我已经取消了你的预定。

en: I hope you enjoy your meal.
cn: 我希望您喜欢您的食物。

en: I just heard an announcement that my flight has been delayed.
cn: 我刚听到广播说我的班机延迟了。

en: I might have made a mistake.
I need to change my flight date.
I need to see your passport.
cn: 我需要看一下你的护照。
ar: أ حتاج أن أرى جواز سفرك

en: I need to talk to a lawyer.
I order my meal a while ago and it still hasn't come.
cn: 我很久以前点的餐，到现在还没来。

en: I see. When can I receive your confirmation?
cn: 明白了。我什么时候可以得到你们的确认?

en: I think this is my seat.
I think we should go and have a try.
I think we'd like to take that one by the window.
cn: 我们想还是靠窗的那张吧。

en: I think you have made a mistake with my order.
cn: 我想你上错我的点的菜了。

en: I want to book one ticket for the next flight to *.
cn: 我想预订一张飞往*的下一班机票。

en: I want to rent a car.
I want to talk to the * embassy.
I wish you a happy joumey.
I would like to make flight reservations.

cn: 来一杯没有咖啡因的咖啡。

en: I'd like to cancel a reservation.
I'd like to cancel my order.
I'd like to get * seats on a flight to *.
ar: أود الحصول على * مقاعد في رحلة جوية إلى *.

en: I'd like to have a seat by the window.
cn: 我想要一个靠窗的座位。
ar: أود الحصول على مقعد بجوار النافذة.

en: I'd like to make a reservation.
I'd like to rent a car.
I'd like to reserve a room.
I'd like to see to your manager.
I'd like to take the first available flight.
I'd like to take the rest home.
cn: 我想把剩下的打包回家。

en: I'd like you to meet a friend of mine.
cn: 我想让你见见我的朋友

en: I'll ask the chef to explain to you.
cn: 我会请主厨来向您解释。

en: I'll be right back with your order.
cn: 我会立即为您送上餐点。
我会给你另外拿来一份。

en: I'll check if we have vacancy.
I'll check it for you at once.
I'll check your order with the chef.
cn: 我会和厨师查对您点的菜。

en: I'll find a table for you.
I'll get some * for you right away.
ar: سأحصل على بعض * لك على الفور.

en: I'll have a glass of lemonade. More ice,please.
cn: 我要一杯柠檬汁，请多放一点冰块。

en: I'll have the chef prepare another one.
cn: 我会请厨师准备另一份。

en: I'll hurry. Please wait a moment.
cn: 我会快点的，请稍等一会儿。

en: I'll log in to the Internet to find out about you. I know your address.
cn: 我还是上因特网去看吧。我知道你们的网址。

en: I'll need an economy ticket with an open return.
cn: 我要经济舱，回程时间不定的来回票。

en: I'll return your suggestion to the chef.
cn: 我会向主厨反应你的意见。
我这就去看看你点的菜。

en: I'll send this back to the kitchen and get you a new one.
cn: 我会把它送回厨房，换拿给您为一份新的。

en: I'll show you to your table.
I'll tell the kitchen to prepare a new one for you.
cn: 我会告诉厨房为您再做一份新的。

en: I'll try to hurry things up.
I'm afraid all our tables are taken.
cn: 恐怕我们所有的桌子都被占用着。

en: I'm afraid I'll miss my connecting flight.
cn: 我会赶不上我下一段的班机了。

en: I'm afraid our hotel is fully booked on that night.
cn: 本店那晚恐怕已经登记满了。

en: I'm afraid that area is under preparation.
cn: 恐怕那一区还在准备中。

en: I'm afraid that table is reserved for * p.m.
cn: 恐怕那张桌子晚上*点以后被预定了。

en: I'm afraid there is a mistake.
I'm afraid We don't have it in stock.
I'm afraid we have no cocktails now.
cn: 现在恐怕没有鸡尾酒了。

en: I'm afraid we have no more time to wait.
cn: 我想我们没时间再等了。

en: I'm afraid we're out of that item.
cn: 恐怕那种货已经卖完了。

en: I'm going to have one waitress to serve you.
cn: 我去安排一个服务员过来。

en: I'm not happy about the dish.
I'm not very happy with the quality of the food here.
cn: 我对这里的饭菜质量非常的不满意。

en: I'm sorry to say that I have to cancel it.
cn: 我很抱歉，我不得不取消这个预定。

en: I'm sorry, but there are no window seats available.
cn: 很抱谦，没有靠窗的座位了。

en: I'm very sorry for the mistake.
I'm very sorry to have kept you waiting.
I'm very sorry, Sir, but we are unable to do that. We would appreciate it very much if you could call us instead.
cn: 先生，非常抱歉，我们不能那样做，如果您能打电话来，我们将会非常感激。

en: I've been waiting for a long time but nobody came to serve me.
cn: 我们已经等了很长时间了，但没人来为我们服务。

en: I've been waiting half an hour for my order.
cn: 从我点餐到现在等了半个小时了。
我已经与厨房检查过了。

en: I've made a reservation at your restaurant.
cn: 我已经在你们餐厅预订过了。

en: If you can't come back within a month, we won't keep it for you.
cn: 如果一个月之内，您不来领的话，我们将不再替您保存。

en: If you don't like the taste of it, perhaps I could get you something else?
cn: 如果您不喜欢这口味，或许我给你换成其他的?

en: If You Forget To Pack Any Standard Toiletry Item（Toothbrush, Toothpaste, Shaving Cream, Razor Or Comb）, Just Call The Front Desk And We'll Get You A Complimentary Repacement Right Away.
cn: 如果您忘了把洗漱物品打入您的包裹（如牙刷，牙膏，剃须膏，剃须刀或梳子），请给前台电话，我们可以立即提供赠送替代品。

en: In whose name was the reservation?

cn: 将钥匙卡插入或擦过处理机。

en: Is it possible for you to change your reservation date?
cn: 你可不可以改变预约日期呢?

en: Is there a cafe near by?
cn: 请问附近有没有咖啡店？
现在还有别的班机可以坐吗?

en: Is there anything else to do before flight time?
cn: 在起飞前还有其他手续要办吗?

en: Is there anywhere I can leave luggage?
cn: 有没有地方让我放行李？
ar: هل هناك مكان أترك فيه أغراضي؟

en: Is there someone here who speaks English?
Is this the right counter to check in at?
It doesn't matter. This one will do.
It is nine in the morning.
It is very hard to find a seat in this restaurant in the evening.
cn: 晚上在这家餐厅很难找到座位。

en: It seems that this food has gone bad.
It's a green suitcase with wheels.
cn: 它是有轮子的绿色行李箱。

en: It's at the end of this aisle.
It's over there next to the window.
cn: 就在那里，靠窗的那一个。

en: Just a minute and I'll see if there are any flights.
cn: 请等一下，让我看看是否有航班。

en: Just a minute. Let me check.
Just a monent,please. Let me check for you.
cn: 请稍等，我来为您查一下。

en: Just a second and I will check the schedule.
cn: 稍等一会儿，我查一下时间表。

en: Just let me know if you need anything else.
cn: 如果你需要其他什么东西，就告诉我。

en: Just Let Our Manager On Duty Or Front Desk Staff Know If Any Part Of Your Stay Isn't Satisfactory.
cn: 如果某处不尽人意请告诉我们的值班经理或前台服务人员。

en: Just make sure you don't have any liquid with you.
cn: 我只是要确定你没有携带液体。

en: Ladies and gentlemen, we are approaching an area of turbulence.
cn: 各位旅客请注意，本班机即将行经乱流区。

en: Laptop computers must be removed from carry-on and placed on X-ray.
cn: 笔记本电脑从随身行李取出接受X光安检。

en: Let me help you with your luggage.
Let me introduce you to eath other.
cn: 让我来给你们相互介绍。

en: Let us raise the glass to friendship.

cn: 你可以在G和H区自助服务亭办理登机手续。

cn: 你们应该要有标识，让顾客知道哪些是有机蔬菜，那些不是。

en: Your meal is on the house.
Your meal, we're really sorry for the delay.
cn: 你的菜，我们真的很抱歉耽搁了。

en: Your seat is confirmed on flight number * leaving at *。
cn: 您的机位以确定，航班号为*，*起飞。

en: Your seat is in the middle of the cabin.
cn: 您的座位在客舱的中部。

en: Your ticket is in order now.
cn: 您的机票现在完全办妥了。

en: Do you have a price limit?
How would you like to pay?
Is there a room for * people?
Are tax and service fees included?
What is the purpose of your trip?
I would like to get a room.
Sorry, we only have that one.
ar: عذرا ، ليس لدينا سوى ذلك واحد.

en: When is the earliest flight to *?
cn: 最早的班机是什么时候？
ar: متى تكون أول رحلة طيران إلى *؟

en: When is the flight landing in *?
Where would you like to go?
How much are you willing to pay?
